# fast-interleave

[![Documentation](https://docs.rs/fast-interleave/badge.svg)](https://docs.rs/fast-interleave)
[![Crates.io](https://img.shields.io/crates/v/fast-interleave.svg)](https://crates.io/crates/fast-interleave)
[![License](https://img.shields.io/crates/l/fast-interleave.svg)](https://codeberg.org/Meadowlark/fast-interleave/src/branch/main/LICENSE)

Fast and easy-to use interleaving and de-interleaving methods in Rust.
